amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress concerning the plebiscite on independence or autonomy in East Timor and calls upon the Indonesian government to disarm anti-independence paramilitary groups.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, no. 24, printed in Part B, H.Rept. 106-235 to express support of the congress for the upcoming plebiscite on independence or autonomy in East Timor and calls upon the Indonesian government to disarm anti-independence paramilitary groups.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bereuter amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
